listitem.para: Extract the 'global/tools' files from MKS into the DESTINATION 'global/tools' directory.
Change the file permissions for all scripts to make them executable.(chmod 777 <filename> )
Add the DESTINATION directory to the account PATH variable in order to use the scripts located in this directory in the following steps.
Edit the cFEBuildMsgIds.h file to contain the appropriate message IDs for each CPU in your DESTINATION configuration.
Extract the 'global/prc' files from MKS into the DESTINATION 'global/prc' directory.
Change the file permissions on all procs so that they are writable. (chmod 666 *.prc)
Compile all procs by entering the command "stol_compiler <filename>".
Extract the 'global/rdl' files from MKS into the DESTINATION 'global/rdl' directory.
Change the file permissions on all procs so that they are writable. (chmod 666 *.rdl)

detaileddescription.para: Next: Populating the Local Directory Up To: Building the Ground Database and Pages
